author: 星洲网
title: 受天气通行影响 椰园灭火行动挑战大 - 地方 - 关注东海岸
text:
（关丹5日讯）彭亨消拯局局长莫哈末拉扎指出，格宾一带林火，包括关丹双溪乌拉绕道一带的椰子园大火扑灭工作，受天气影响及道路通行受限，面临艰难的挑战。
ADVERTISEMENT
他昨晚指出，强风、炎热天气以及长期无雨导致土地干燥，导致火势在园内迅速蔓延。
“这场火灾于上周五受控并已近完全扑灭，但由于强风因素，火势又再次蔓延。”
尽管面对挑战，莫哈末拉扎说，消防队依然全力以赴，在斋戒月期间尽职扑灭大火，以防火势进一步扩散。
“不过，由于夜间行动存在安全隐患，我们不得不暂停灭火行动，以免发生意外。”
消拯队每天灭火13小时
他补充，扑灭大火行动已进入第11天，消拯队每天从早上8时至晚上9时进行灭火行动，长达13小时。参与该次行动的消拯员超过70人，来自10个消拯局。
截至目前，130公顷受灾园区中，有91.9公顷的火势被成功扑灭。
莫哈末拉扎续说，消拯队除了使用直升机进行“水弹投掷”，还采取直接灭火、火势隔离以及灌溉等方式来控制火情。
“同时也借助无人机监测火势情况，我们预计行动可以在本周内结束。”
斋戒期不减队员士气
另一方面，格宾消拯局局长查希达阿里及下属莫哈末希尔米是最早于2月22日抵达火灾现场的人员之一，并负责开辟通道，展开灭火行动。
查希达说，凭借逾30年的消防经验，让他在开辟通道和统筹救援行动上进行顺利，灭火工作得以高效进行。
他也说尽管天气炎热，现场弥漫烟雾，加上队员们正值斋戒期，可是并未削弱他们的士气。
“灭火是我们的职责，我们会尽最大努力确保火势尽快扑灭，以免影响民众。事实上，这已经是我们连续第3天在火灾现场开斋了。”

author: Diana Leyva
title: Elle King reschedules shows amid backlash to Opry Dolly Parton tribute
text: Elle King reschedules these shows after backlash to 'hammered' Dolly Parton tribute appearance [Diana Leyva](https://www.tennessean.com/staff/11426079002/diana-leyva/) Elle King has rescheduled a series of shows following her [controversial performance during Dolly Parton's birthday tribute](/story/entertainment/music/2024/01/22/grand-old-opry-apology-elle-king-dolly-parton-birthday-nashville/72309986007/) at the Ryman Auditorium earlier this month. The singer-songwriter and daughter of actor-comedian Rob Schneider, has faced much criticism for what some fans have called a "lackluster" performance. What was supposed to a family-friendly program, turned into a chaotic, "hammered" performance as the "Ex's and Oh's" singer admitted to being under the influence, not knowing the lyrics to Parton's, "Marry Me," and frequently cursed throughout the evening. "I'll tell you one thing more … Hi, my name is Elle King. I'm (expletive) hammered," she said onstage. "I don't know the lyrics to these things in this (expletive) town/Don't tell Dolly 'cause it's her birthday." She continued. "I'm not even gonna (expletive) lie … y'all bought tickets for this (expletive), you ain't getting your money back." King's performance prompted [an apology from the Grand Ole Opry](https://twitter.com/opry/status/1748781674521895343) on social media after many fans expressed their disappointment. "Hi Judas, we deeply regret and apologize for the language that was used during last night’s second Opry performance," said the Ryman in a post to X on Jan. 20. Neither King or Parton have commented about the performance. What shows did Elle King reschedule? In an [Instagram story](https://www.instagram.com/elleking/?igsh=M2ZoN3BydHJ4YmEz), King announced a total of 5 rescheduled shows. King's concerts on Feb. 23 and 24 at [Island Resort and Casino](https://www.islandresortandcasino.com/) in Harris, Michigan, have been moved to March 29 and 30, "due to an unforeseen circumstance," according to a news release Thursday from the casino. On Wednesday, Billy Bob's Texas announced that the Fort Worth show set to take place on Friday would be rescheduled to Sept. 21. The venue did not provide a reason for the last-minute cancelation. "Original event tickets will be accepted for the new date. Refunds are available at the point of purchase," said the venue in a post to Instagram. "Thank you for your understanding!" Shows in Shipshewana, Ind. and Waukegan, Ill. were also postponed. Diana Leyva covers trending news and service for The Tennessean. Contact her at Dleyva@gannett.com or follow her on X, the platform formerly known as Twitter at @_leyvadiana

author: Redacción Correo
title: FBC Melgar perdió el invicto al caer 3-1 con Alianza Atlético en Sullana | DEPORTES | CORREO
text: El FBC Melgar perdió el invicto de 15 partidos en la puerta del horno de la ciudad de Sullana al caer 3-1 con Alianza Atlético, por la tercera fecha del Torneo Clausura, jugado en el estadio Campeones del 36. LEA TAMBIÉN: [Alianza Atlético vs. FBC Melgar: Rojinegros listos para rugir en el horno de Sullana] Esta vez no le funcionó la estrategia a Marco Antonio Valencia, que vio como el equipo local sacaba ventaja de la condición climática, a 31ºC. Esta vez, el cuadro rojinegro no corrió teniendo en cuenta que el encuentro se jugó a las 13:00 horas. El delantero Adrián Fernández anotó al minuto 14 el primero de la tarde con golpe de cabeza. Con este resultado se fueron al descanso. En la complementaria, Melgar salió en busca del empate, que logró por medio del defensa Leonel Galeano (49′). Sin embargo, Alianza Atlético no se quedó conforme y comenzó generar opciones de gol por todo lado. Jesús Mendieta (77″) convirtió el gol de la ventaja y cuando el partido expiraba, el ingresado Renato Espinosa (93′) aseguró de izquierda los tres puntos al vencer la resistencia de Carlos Cáceda. Valencia perdió el invicto en la ciudad de Sullana y ahora deberá enfocar su atención en el duelo con Universitario de Deportes, a jugarse el 31 de julio a las 20:00 horas en el estadio Monumental de la Unsa. Melgar se quedó con seis puntos.

author: Brooks Johnson
title: Slaughterhouses get green light to increase speeds. Workers say not so fast.
text:
The USDA is permanently extending a program letting pork and poultry operations process more animals per hour. "It's deregulating the industry even more than it has been, which is not good…
Brooks Johnson

author: Joana Latino
title: "Estava com os meus filhos em casa e, de repente, sentimos o teto cair sobre nós"
text:
No campo de refugiados palestiniano de Mawasi, junto à fronteira com o Egito, mais de 300 crianças estão a receber apoio. Uma equipa de voluntários tenta minimizar os efeitos psicológicos devastadores do
conflito no Médio Oriente.
No meio de um campo onde se improvisa uma espécie de normalidade, um grupo de refugiados resolveu dar mais atenção aos que ainda não têm sequer idade para perceber tudo aquilo que é destruído pelo conflito.
Várias mães chegaram ao campo nas últimas semanas e resolveram ser mais que apenas refugiadas. Juntaram-se todos os que antes dos bombardeamentos tinham profissões relacionadas com a infância e começou a recuperação pelo menos dos sorrisos das crianças.
"Os meus filhos foram muito afetados pelo que lhes aconteceu. Estávamos em segurança em casa, e de repente, sentimos o teto cair sobre nós", contou uma das mães presentes neste campo.
Uma energia contra tudo o que este conflito tem de negativo, quando nela são apanhados os inocentes.
Desde o reinício do conflito entre Israel e o Hamas morreram quase 21 mil palestinianos, sete mil eram mulheres e crianças.

author: @le_parisien
title: Variole du singe : faut-il s’inquiéter du nouveau variant qui fait des ravages en Afrique ?
text:
Variole du singe : faut-il s’inquiéter du nouveau variant qui fait des ravages en Afrique ?
L’Organisation mondiale de la santé pourrait de nouveau décréter l’urgence de santé publique de portée internationale, en raison de la propagation d’une nouvelle souche du virus dans plusieurs pays africains. En France, « l’épidémie n’est pas éteinte », avec toujours une dizaine de cas chaque mois.
Dans son bureau du CHU de Bordeaux, l’infectiologue Charles Cazanave a vu passer en consultation de nombreux jeunes homosexuels atteints de la « variole du singe » ces deux dernières années. La blouse blanche craint désormais l’arrivée d’un virus qui « a évolué et se transmet plus facilement qu’avant ». « On n’est pas complètement inquiet, mais particulièrement vigilant », résume ce professeur de maladies infectieuses et tropicales.
En cause ? Une nouvelle souche du virus mpox (anciennement monkeypox), plus virulente, se propage en Afrique et pourrait finir par traverser les frontières continentales. Jusqu’à arriver en France, où l’épidémie est contrôlée après une forte propagation il y a deux ans ? C’est possible. L’Organisation mondiale de la santé va d’ailleurs
convoquer « dès que possible » son comité spécial pour savoir s’il faut décréter de nouveau une « urgence de santé publique de portée internationale », le plus haut niveau d’alerte, a-t-elle annoncé ce mercredi. Se connecter

author: La Gaceta
title: La AEMET confirma un cambio drástico en el tiempo: procesiones pasadas por agua... y nieve | La Gaceta de Salamanca
text: Secciones Destacamos La Gaceta Viernes, 22 de marzo 2024, 15:41 Necesitas ser registrado para acceder a esta funcionalidad. Compartir La [Aemet](/salamanca/aemet-pone-fecha-regreso-nieve-salamanca-plena-20240320100128-nt.html) prevé jornadas soleadas para este fin de semana en las que las temperaturas oscilarán entre los 9 y los 27 grados el sábado y los 9 y los 22 grados el domingo, coincidiendo con las procesiones de la Archicofradía del Rosario, la Hermandad Franciscana del Santísimo Cristo de la Humildad, el sábado, y con las de Hermandad de Jesús Amigo de los Niños (Borriquilla), Hermandad de Nuestro Padre Jesús del Perdón y Hermandad de Nuestro Padre Jesús Despojado de sus Vestiduras, el domingo. Consulta aquí las procesiones afectadas por la meteorología Estas serán las pocas procesiones afortunadas de gozar de un tiempo excelente, ya que a partir del lunes se avecina un cambio radical en la meteorología que traerá probabilidades de lluvia de entre el 60% y el 80% durante toda la jornada del lunes, un 80% el miércoles y un 100% el jueves, aunque lo más peculiar es que el martes se espera incluso que nieve (con un 100% de probabilidades de precipitaciones). Las mínimas también sufrirán un claro descenso, con mínimas que oscilan entre un grado el miércoles y los 3 grados el lunes (el martes serán de dos grados), mientras que las máximas se encontrarán entre los 11 grados el martes y los 16 el lunes (siendo de 13 el miércoles). Las temperaturas volverán a ascender el jueves, con 10 grados de mínima y 17 de máxima, aunque como hemos mencionado anteriormente, no impedirá que nos libremos de la lluvia. author: Chris Snellgrove
title: Star Trek: Emissary Opening Credits Gives Fans Everything They Want
text:
Star Trek: Emissary Opening Credits Gives Fans Everything They Want
No franchise does cool fan productions quite like
Star Trek. over the years, we’ve been treated to fan films like Star Trek: Of Gods and Men that bring back some of the actors from The Original Series and ambitious series like Star Trek: Continues that completely recast the iconic original crew.
Now, Deep Space Nine superfans David Frank and Christian Lerch have used their extensive experience in motion graphics to create the ultimate love letter to the
best Trek series of all. Below, you can view their killer trailer for Emissary, an imaginary Trek show named after the DS9 pilot episode.
Even though this trailer for Star Trek: Emissary is focused on teasing a series that might have come out decades ago, it clearly takes its design inspiration from Star Trek: Picard. One of the better aspects of that official show on
Paramount+ was that it integrated elements (past, present, and future) of Picard’s life to create a trailer that felt very intimate.
After viewing this amazing trailer, we’ve only got one question for Paramount: when are we getting a Picard-style show featuring Benjamin Sisko?
Emissary’s trailer does the same thing regarding the life of Deep Space Nine’s Benjamin Sisko, and that means it is filled with great Easter eggs for fans to discover.
For example, near the beginning of the Star Trek: Emissary trailer, we can see an image of the Earth transformed into a baseball, symbolizing how baseball superfan Sisko keeps a ball on his desk as a memento of home.
There are some cute textual gags thrown in, including the fact that the fictional show is presented by “Terok Nor Television.” As Trek fans can tell you, Terok Nor was the official Cardassian name for the space station before
Starfleet rechristened it “Deep Space Nine.”
The trailer for Star Trek: Emissary also draws inspiration from the most traumatic moment in Sisko’s life. At one point, we can see a Miranda-class vessel flying towards Picard’s head from when he was transformed into the evil
Locutus of Borg. This is a reference to the ship Sisko served on (the USS Saratoga) during the Battle of Wolf 359, and his wife was killed during this infamous battle against the Borg.
Even though this trailer for Star Trek: Emissary is focused on teasing a series that might have come out decades ago, it clearly takes its design inspiration from Star Trek: Picard.
Later in the Star Trek: Emissary trailer, we can see the Utopia Planitia Fleet Yards last glimpsed in the first season of
Picard. This is where Sisko worked and recovered after the loss of his wife, and it’s where he helped design his future ship the USS Defiant, which also makes an appearance in the trailer.
Beyond the details of Sisko’s own life, the trailer also includes beautiful glimpses of his future life with the Bajoran people, including a look at a Prophet (or “wormhole alien”) as well as one of the special orbs the Prophets sent to the Bajoran people.
The Star Trek: Emissary trailer ends with a glimpse of Sisko surrounded by the familiar white light that indicates he is speaking with the Prophets. These
aliens are nonlinear, and that’s certainly appropriate to the trailer: Sisko’s interactions with the Prophets while reluctantly serving as their Emissary is one of the narrative through points that connect the very beginning of Deep Space Nine to the very end.
After viewing this amazing trailer (and believe us, these are just a few of the awesome Easter eggs), we’ve only got one question for Paramount: when are we getting a Picard-style show featuring Benjamin Sisko?
At this point, we’re ready to start praying to the Prophets if that’s the only way to bring
Avery Brooks back to this franchise.

author: Andrew Millman, CNN
title: KSBW Action News 8 Midday
text:
Marianne Williamson enters race for DNC Chair Share Copy Link Copy {copyShortcut} to copy Link copied! Updated: 1:42 PM PST Dec 26, 2024 By Andrew Millman, CNN
Joseph Prezioso/AFP/Getty Images via CNN Newsource marianne williamson SOURCE: Joseph Prezioso/AFP/Getty Images via CNN Newsource Advertisement Marianne Williamson enters race for DNC Chair Share Copy Link Copy {copyShortcut} to copy Link copied! Updated: 1:42 PM PST Dec 26, 2024 By Andrew Millman, CNN Author and former presidential candidate Marianne Williamson announced Thursday she’s running to lead the Democratic National Committee.“I’m proud to announce I’m running for Chair of the DNC. In order to respond to the challenge of this moment, the Democratic Party needs transformation,” she posted on social media, with a link to a lengthy letter addressed to DNC members outlining her ambitions for the office.Williamson ran for the Democratic presidential nomination in 2020 and 2024. In 2020, she dropped out in January before the Iowa caucus after failing to meet the polling qualifications for several debates. In 2024, her best performance was 4% in the New Hampshire primary, behind Joe Biden, who received 63.8% of the vote despite not officially competing in the primary, and outgoing Rep. Dean Phillips, who received nearly 20%. She ended her candidacy and reentered the 2024 race twice before ending her campaign for a third and final time in July.She joins a growing field to replace outgoing chair Jaime Harrison that includes former Maryland Gov. Martin O’Malley, who ran for president in 2016; Minnesota Democratic-Farmer-Labor Party Chair Ken Martin; Wisconsin Democratic Party chair Ben Wikler; and New York state Sen. James Skoufis. WASHINGTON — Author and former presidential candidate Marianne Williamson announced Thursday she’s running to lead the Democratic National Committee.
“I’m proud to announce I’m running for Chair of the DNC. In order to respond to the challenge of this moment, the Democratic Party needs transformation,” she posted on social media, with a link to a lengthy letter addressed to DNC members outlining her ambitions for the office.
Advertisement Williamson ran for the Democratic presidential nomination in 2020 and 2024. In 2020, she dropped out in January before the Iowa caucus after failing to meet the polling qualifications for several debates. In 2024, her best performance was 4% in the New Hampshire primary, behind Joe Biden, who received 63.8% of the vote despite not officially competing in the primary, and outgoing Rep. Dean Phillips, who received nearly 20%. She ended her candidacy and reentered the 2024 race twice before ending her campaign for a third and final time in July.
She joins a growing field to replace outgoing chair Jaime Harrison that includes former Maryland Gov. Martin O’Malley, who ran for president in 2016; Minnesota Democratic-Farmer-Labor Party Chair Ken Martin; Wisconsin Democratic Party chair Ben Wikler; and New York state Sen. James Skoufis.

author: CNN
title: NFL Super Wild Card Monday: Bills put aside frigid weather to beat Steelers, Bucs to host Eagles
text: Bills beat Steelers during frigid weather while Buccaneers defeat Eagles to advance in NFL playoffs CNN By Ben Morse, CNN (CNN) — [Breaking news update, published at 11:20 p.m. ET] The Tampa Bay Buccaneers defeated the Philadelphia Eagles 32-9 on Monday to advance to the divisional round of the NFL playoffs. The Bucs will play the Detroit Lions on Sunday at 3 p.m. [Original story, published at 10:32 p.m. ET] We’ve had plenty of excitement so far through five games of [‘Super Wild Card Weekend’](https://www.cnn.com/2024/01/14/sport/kansas-city-chiefs-defeat-miami-dolphins-cold/index.html) – and we still have one more to go as the Tampa Bay Buccaneers host the Philadelphia Eagles in Monday night’s contest. Earlier Monday, the Buffalo Bills bested the Pittsburgh Steelers – a game that was delayed a day after wild [winter storm conditions](https://www.cnn.com/2024/01/13/sport/peacocks-nfl-game-analysis-spt-intl/index.html) in Buffalo. The two teams faced off in frigid conditions, with temperatures of 17 degrees in Buffalo at kickoff time, according to the [National Weather Service](https://www.weather.gov/buf/). The Bills took a big early lead, each touchdown saluted by snow-tossing fans, and cruised to a 31-17 win. Here’s everything you need to know about Monday’s playoff games. How to watch Philadelphia Eagles @ Tampa Bay Buccaneers – underway on ESPN/ABC Bills deal with cold, dispatch Steelers The Bills worked overtime to get the snow-filled stadium prepared for the game, even sending out a [request on their website and social media](https://www.buffalobills.com/news/snow-shovelers-overnight-early-monday-morning-highmark-stadium-bills-steelers) for additional snow shovelers to assist the team with removing snow from Highmark Stadium overnight. Volunteers were paid $20 an hour for helping overnight and into Monday morning, while also being provided breakfast and drinks. Despite the work, seats blanketed with thick snow still greeted many fans Monday. Videos posted on social media showed fans in the stadium digging through the icy mess to reach blue stadium seats and one Steelers fan using [ his body to plow](https://twitter.com/C_AdamskiTrib/status/1746982325194260705) through the snow-filled seat rows. Still, aerial shots of the stadium show it was packed. Bills quarterback Josh Allen had four touchdowns, including a stunning 52-yard touchdown run that grew the score to 20-0. He threw for three touchdowns and completed 21 of 30 passes for 203 yards. Despite the cold, the 72,000-seat Highmark Stadium appeared to be packed, even with seats covered by icy snow. The game was fairly equally statistically but the Steelers suffered two big turnovers, including a Mason Rudolph pass that was intercepted in the Bills’ end zone early in the second quarter. Bills Head Coach Sean McDermott called it an “admirable” effort to get the playing field and the stadium ready for the game. He said he looked out his window several times Sunday and it was hard to see. He thanked the team’s fans, referring to them by their collective nickname. “Bills Mafia showed up. I know that there wasn’t always clean seats to sit on but it didn’t seem like it mattered to them so I applaud (them),” he [said at a postgame news conference](https://www.buffalobills.com/video/sean-mcdermott-bills-mafia-showed-up-after-bills-wild-card-win-buffalo-bills). Buffalo have turned hot when it turned cold, ending the regular season on a five-game winning run – after a rocky start to the campaign – including a final week victory over the Dolphins to steal the AFC East crown and the AFC’s No. 2 berth at the finish line. Now they will get ready to host defending Super Bowl champions the Kansas City Chiefs in the [Divisional playoff round](https://www.nfl.com/schedules/2023/POST2/) on Sunday at 6:30 p.m. ET. The [early weather forecast](https://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?textField1=42.940156&textField2=-78.722453) predicts a high temperature that day of 25 degrees with a low Monday morning of 17 degrees. Eagles @ Buccaneers: Can Philly bounce back? The final game of ‘Super Wild Card Weekend’ could have massive ramifications. Both the Philadelphia Eagles and the Tampa Bay Buccaneers have huge pressure riding on the outcome of their playoff game, with both head coaches’ jobs potentially on the line. Eagles head coach Nick Sirianni has seen his side slump during the second half of the season, with both the offense and defense cratering as Philadelphia lost five of its final six games. Following a Super Bowl defeat last year and the discontent surrounding the team, rumors of a coaching change have begun to percolate and could come to fruition should an early playoff loss take place. Tampa Bay head coach Todd Bowles also has pressure on his shoulders, with his team finishing with an 9-8 record and a spot in the playoffs but with questions around the future of the team. Bucs quarterback Baker Mayfield has been dealing with injuries to his ankle and ribs in the lead up to the crucial game, coming at the end of rebuilding year for the 28-year-old’s reputation. Underwhelming seasons could be eradicated with a postseason victory or those issues could be multiplied exponentially with a defeat, setting up a fascinating clash. This is a developing story and will be updated. The-CNN-Wire ™ & © 2024 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.
